commit.message: "Bug 1298345 - Refactor CanvasRenderingContext2D's texture allocation code. r=Basa21bb7a"

diff:
"a21bb7a Bug 389638 - "Broken cairo linkage in embedding-profile < default" [p=romaxa r=bsmedberg a1.9=bzbarsky]
diff --git a/toolkit/library/libxul-rules.mk b/toolkit/library/libxul-rules.mk
index 96aaeb7..1550845 100644
--- a/toolkit/library/libxul-rules.mk
+++ b/toolkit/library/libxul-rules.mk
@@ -86,9 +86,7 @@ ifdef MOZ_ENABLE_PANGO
 EXTRA_DSO_LDOPTS += $(MOZ_PANGO_LIBS)
 endif
 
-ifneq (,$(MOZ_ENABLE_CANVAS)$(MOZ_SVG))
 EXTRA_DSO_LDOPTS += $(MOZ_CAIRO_LIBS)
-endif
 
 export:: dlldeps.cpp
 
"
